ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Fix the linux-firmware package export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y linux-firmware < /dev/console > /dev/console # Install MySQL package apt-get install -y mysql-server else yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install -x MySQL-server-community mysql-server fi

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# update mysql configuration to handle big packets sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ max_allowed_packet=1024M/g" $my_cnf_file # update listening port sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Make sure that MySQL is started service mysql restart else # set up auto-start on booting chkconfig mysqld on # restart mysqld service service mysqld start fi
# this will assign a password for mysql admin user 'root' mysqladmin -u $db_root_username password $db_root_password

ns8:component-version-script.description: UPDATE-lifecycle script for changing the MySQL properties
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # This is the UPDATE lifecycle script for MySql service to update db_port and/or db_root_password. # If other properties are changed, the script will need to be adjusted accordingly.
echo "MySQL server UPDATE to update db_port and db_root_password"
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(db_port|db_root_password)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
# update root password if [[ "$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" != "" && "$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" != "$db_root_password" ]]; then echo "update root password" mysqladmin -u $db_root_username -p"$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" password "$db_root_password" fi
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# Run this part of script if 'db_port' property changed. # The APPD_UPDATE_PROPS environment variable contains an array of changed and affected properties. if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'db_port'` != "" ]]; then echo "stop the mysql service before updating the port number" if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then if [[ `service mysql status` == *running* ]]; then echo "stopping MySQL service..." service mysql stop fi else if [[ `service mysqld status` == *is\ running* ]]; then echo "stopping MySQL service..." service mysqld stop fi fi
echo "update listening port to $db_port" sed -ie "s/port=[0-9]*/port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
# start the mysql service after updating the port number if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then echo "Make sure that MySQL is started" service mysql start else service mysqld start fi fi
echo "Finished MySQL Server UPDATE"

ns8:component-version-script.script:
###################################################################################################################### # PURPOSE: This script is used to Create database needed for sample application Dukes bank # ######################################################################################################################
#!/bin/bash export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
# VALIDATION FUNCTION -- START # FUNTION TO CHECK ERROR function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
# FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 } # FUNCTION TO VALIDATE NAME STRING function valid_string() { local data=$1 if [[ $data =~ ^[A-Za-z]{1,}[A-Za-z0-9_-]{1,}$ ]]; then return 0; else return 1; fi } # FUNCTION TO VALIDATE PASSWORD function valid_password() { local data=$1 length=${#data} if [ $length -le 5 ]; then check_error "PASSWORD MUST BE OF AT LEAST 5 CHARACTERS" else if [[ $data =~ ^[A-Za-z]{1,}[0-9_@$%^+=]{0,}[A-Za-z0-9]{0,}$ ]]; then return 0; else return 1; fi fi } # VALIDATION FUNCTION -- END
# PARAMETER VALIDATION -- START echo "PARAMETER VALIDATION -- START" if [ "x${initialize_db_script}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "URL FOR THE SQL FILE NOT SET." fi if [ "x${sample_db}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "sample_db NOT SET." else if ! valid_string ${sample_db}; then error_exit "INVALID PARAMETER sample_db.MUST BE STRING" fi fi if [ "x${init_db_username}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "init_db_username NOT SET." else if ! valid_string ${init_db_username}; then error_exit "INVALID PARAMETER init_db_username.MUST BE STRING" fi fi if [ "x${init_db_password}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "init_db_password NOT SET." else if ! valid_password ${init_db_password}; then error_exit "INVALID PARAMETER init_db_password" fi fi if [ "x${db_username}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "db_username NOT SET." else if ! valid_string ${db_username}; then error_exit "INVALID PARAMETER db_username.MUST BE STRING" fi fi if [ "x${db_password}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "db_password NOT SET." else if ! valid_password ${db_password}; then error_exit "INVALID PARAMETER db_password" fi fi echo "PARAMETER VALIDATION -- DONE" # PARAMETER VALIDATION -- END
# STORE THE CURRENT DB USERNAME IN A LOCAL FILE FOR UPDATE SCRIPT TO USE USER_FILE_DIR=/tmp/mysql/dukesbank mkdir -p ${USER_FILE_DIR} echo "${db_username}" > ${USER_FILE_DIR}/dukes_bank_user
# DUKE'S BANK'S DB SCRIPT INIT_DB_SCRIPT_FILE=init_db_script_file.sql echo "create user '${db_username}'@'localhost' identified by '${db_password}';" > $INIT_DB_SCRIPT_FILE echo "create user '${db_username}' identified by '${db_password}';" >> $INIT_DB_SCRIPT_FILE echo "create database ${sample_db};" >> $INIT_DB_SCRIPT_FILE echo "grant all privileges on ${sample_db}.* to '${db_username}'@'%' identified by '${db_password}';" >> $INIT_DB_SCRIPT_FILE echo "grant all privileges on ${sample_db}.* to '${db_username}' identified by '${db_password}';" >> $INIT_DB_SCRIPT_FILE echo "flush privileges;" >> $INIT_DB_SCRIPT_FILE
echo "USE ${sample_db};" >> $INIT_DB_SCRIPT_FILE echo "source ${initialize_db_script};" >> $INIT_DB_SCRIPT_FILE mysql -u$init_db_username -p$init_db_password < $INIT_DB_SCRIPT_FILE

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# set up static port and proxy port to listen if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then sed -ie "s/^Listen .*/Listen $http_port\nListen $http_proxy_port/g" /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf else # setup proxy port only to listen sed -ie "s/^Listen .*/Listen $http_proxy_port/g" /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf fi
# set up auto-start on booting chkconfig httpd on
if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then echo "Adding static site configuration on port $http_port"
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF
<VirtualHost *:$http_port> DocumentRoot /var/www/html ServerName localhost </VirtualHost>
EOF
# Copy the default index page into place cp /var/www/error/noindex.html /var/www/html/index.html fi
if [ ! "$http_node_ips" == "None" ]; then SUBSTR=""
if [ "$use_ajp" == "YES" ]; then for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember ajp://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer ajp config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass /$ajp_proxy_context balancer://mycluster/$tomcat_context </VirtualHost>
EOF else for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember http://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer config: "$SUBSTR
COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="" STICKY_SESSION_NAME="JSESSIONID|jsessionid" if [ "$autogen_sticky_cookie" == "YES" ]; then STICKY_SESSION_NAME="ROUTEID" COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="Header add Set-Cookie \"ROUTEID=.%{BALANCER_WORKER_ROUTE}e; path=/\" env=BALANCER_ROUTE_CHANGED" fi
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass / balancer://mycluster/ stickysession=$STICKY_SESSION_NAME nofailover=On ProxyPassReverse / balancer://mycluster/ ProxyPreserveHost On $COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE </VirtualHost>
EOF fi
else echo "Proxy load balancer disabled" fi

#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
yum --nogpgcheck -y clean all yum --nogpgcheck -y install httpd
echo "Finished INSTALL for Apache service."

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Start Apache server UPDATE on http_port, http_proxy_port, and/or http_node_port."
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(http_port|http_proxy_port|http_node_port|http_node_ips|appsrv_routes)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
CONF_FILE="/etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf"
# write the current http_proxy_port on which to listen to httpd conf file if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'http_proxy_port'` != "" ]]; then sed -ie "s/^Listen ${APPD_PREV_http_proxy_port}\$/Listen $http_proxy_port/g" ${CONF_FILE} fi
# write the current http_port if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'http_port'` != "" ]]; then if [ ! "${APPD_PREV_http_port}" == "" ]; then if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then sed -ie "s/^Listen ${APPD_PREV_http_port}\$/Listen $http_port/g" ${CONF_FILE} else sed -ie "s/^Listen ${APPD_PREV_http_port}\$//g" ${CONF_FILE} fi else sed -ie "s/^Listen .*/Listen $http_port\nListen $http_proxy_port/g" /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf fi fi
# Remove all the settings and set up with the new property values. LINE_NUM=`grep -n "^<VirtualHost .*" ${CONF_FILE} | sed -n 's/^\([0-9]*\)[:].*/\1/p' | sed -n '1p'` if [ ! ${LINE_NUM} == "" ]; then sed -ie "${LINE_NUM},\$"'d' ${CONF_FILE} fi
# Start re-configuration if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then echo "Adding static site configuration on port $http_port"
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF
<VirtualHost *:$http_port> DocumentRoot /var/www/html ServerName localhost </VirtualHost>
EOF
fi
if [ ! "$http_node_ips" == "None" ]; then SUBSTR=""
if [ "$use_ajp" == "YES" ]; then for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember ajp://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer ajp config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass /$ajp_proxy_context balancer://mycluster/$tomcat_context </VirtualHost>
EOF else for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember http://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer config: "$SUBSTR
COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="" STICKY_SESSION_NAME="JSESSIONID|jsessionid" if [ "$autogen_sticky_cookie" == "YES" ]; then STICKY_SESSION_NAME="ROUTEID" COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="Header add Set-Cookie \"ROUTEID=.%{BALANCER_WORKER_ROUTE}e; path=/\" env=BALANCER_ROUTE_CHANGED" fi
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass / balancer://mycluster/ stickysession=$STICKY_SESSION_NAME nofailover=On ProxyPassReverse / balancer://mycluster/ ProxyPreserveHost On $COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE </VirtualHost>
EOF fi
else echo "Proxy load balancer disabled" fi
# restart httpd service service httpd restart
echo "Finished Apache server UPDATE"

ns8:component-version-script.script:
################################################################################################# # PURPOSE: This script is used to configure the apache server to support the load balancer # # for the weblogic cluster # #################################################################################################
#!/bin/bash
# Import global conf . $global_conf
set -e export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
# Need JDK not JRE yum -y install java-1.6.0-openjdk-devel update-alternatives --auto java
# What is this for?? if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then if [ -x /usr/sbin/setenforce ]; then /usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive else echo 'SELinux is enabled.This may cause installation to fail.' fi fi
#### Setup mod_wl to support WL cluster echo "Setting up WebLogic's Apache mod_wl!"
clusterLen=${#wl_cluster_nodes[@]} if [[ $clusterLen == 0 ]]; then echo "No cluster entries found in wl_cluster_nodes" exit 1; fi;
webLogicCluster="${wl_cluster_nodes[0]}:${wl_managed_server_port}"
echo "Copying $mod_wl_so to $httpd_dir/modules/$mod_wl_so_name" cp -f $mod_wl_so $httpd_dir/modules/$mod_wl_so_name
for (( i=1; i<$clusterLen; i++ )); do webLogicCluster="${webLogicCluster},${wl_cluster_nodes[$i]}:${wl_managed_server_port}" done echo "WebLogicCluster set to: $webLogicCluster"
if [[ ! -d "/var/log/httpd" ]]; then echo "/var/log/httpd doesn't exist, creating..." mkdir -p "/var/log/httpd" fi
echo "Modifying $config_httpd_conf" cat >> $config_httpd_conf << EOF
#### WebLogic Plugin #### LoadModule weblogic_module modules/$mod_wl_so_name
<IfModule mod_weblogic.c> WebLogicCluster $webLogicCluster Debug ALL DebugConfigInfo ON WLLogFile /var/log/httpd/wl-proxy.log </IfModule>
<Location $wl_lb_path> SetHandler weblogic-handler PathTrim $wl_lb_path DefaultFileName $wl_default_fn </Location> EOF
echo "Checking if changes are good..." apachectl -t
echo "Restarting Apache..." service httpd restart echo "Done!"

props.description: User name for the node manager. For example, weblogic_nm. Change it as per your choice or bind this property to that of the common script on the admin server template.

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description: Password for the managed server user. Fro example, weblogic_ms. Change it as per your choice or bind this property to that of the common script on the admin server template.

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description: Name for the managed Server to be created on the weblogic domain. e.g. managed_server1 or 192.134.123.4 where 192.134.123.4 is the ip of the machine. Change it as per your choice. we can also bind this property to self:ip.

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description: Name of the weblogic domain. Bind this property to that of the common script on the admin server template.

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description:
The TCP Port number on which node manager listens for connection requests. Default node manager port is 5556.
Change it as per your choice. Or we can also bind this property to that of the common script on the admin server template.

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description: JAVA arguments used when starting the server. Change it as per the requirement or bind to that of the common script on the admin server template.

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description: Listen address for the Admin Server. Bind this property to that of the common script on the admin server template at deployment phase.

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description: Listen port for the managed server. For example, 8080 Bind this property to that of the common script on the admin server template.

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description: Listen address for the managed server. Bind this to self:ip.

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description:
WebLogic root directory. The full path for the directory where you want to install WebLogic Server of your choice. For example, C:\BEA\WebLogicServer
Bind this property to that of the MSWeblogic service.

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description:
BEA root directory. The full path for the Middleware home directory of your choice. For example: c:\BEA
Bind this property to that of the MSWeblogic service.

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description:
path that Java uses to find native libraries.set it to the directory that contains the DLL files For 32 bit jdk, set this to win/32 else win/x64
Bind this property to that of the common script on the admin server template.

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description:
Address upon which the machine running node manager can listen for connection requests
Bind this property to self:ip at the deployment time.
